    Wrangle and check PACTA results

    wrangle_and_check_pacta_results.Rd

    Function applies several filter steps to

    1. restrict PACTA results to scenarios useable for stresstesting

    2. to apply run/project related selections.

    wrangle_and_check_pacta_results(
  pacta_results,
  start_year,
  time_horizon,
  scenario_geography_filter,
  scenarios_filter,
  allocation_method
)

    Arguments

    pacta_results

    Results from PACTA analysis.

    start_year

    Numeric, holding start year of analysis.

    time_horizon

    Numeric, holding time horizon of analysis.

    scenario_geography_filter

    Character. A vector of length 1 that indicates which geographic scenario to apply in the analysis.

    scenarios_filter

    Vector holding baseline and shock scenario name.

    allocation_method

    Character. A vector of length 1 indicating the set of PACTA data to be used in the analysis, based on the choice of an allocation rule.

    Value

    Wrangled pacta_results.

    Details

    Also consistency checks are run.

    Contents

    Developed by Jacob Kastl, 2 Degrees Investing Initiative.
